thing-type.label: Generic ComfoAir Ventilation System
thing-type.description: Provides a generic access to a ComfoAir compatible ventilation system

parameter.name: serialPort
parameter.label: Serial Port
parameter.description: Serial port that the ComfoAir is connected to

channel-type.label: Activate Binding Control
channel-type.description: Activate (control through openHAB) or deactivate (return control to CCEase) binding control

channel-type.label: Fan Out Level 0 (away)
channel-type.description: Fan level 0 performance (%) of outgoing fan

channel-type.label: Fan Out Level 1
channel-type.description: Fan level 1 performance (%) of outgoing fan

channel-type.label: Fan Out Level 2
channel-type.description: Fan level 2 performance (%) of outgoing fan

channel-type.label: Fan Out Level 3
channel-type.description: Fan level 3 performance (%) of outgoing fan

channel-type.label: Fan In Level 0 (away)
channel-type.description: Fan level 0 performance (%) of incoming fan

channel-type.label: Fan In Level 1
channel-type.description: Fan level 1 performance (%) of incoming fan

channel-type.label: Fan In Level 2
channel-type.description: Fan level 2 performance (%) of incoming fan

channel-type.label: Fan In Level 3
channel-type.description: Fan level 3 performance (%) of incoming fan

channel-type.label: Fan In (%)
channel-type.description: Current relative speed (%) of incoming fan

channel-type.label: Fan Out (%)
channel-type.description: Current relative speed (%) of outgoing fan

channel-type.label: Fan In (rpm)
channel-type.description: Current absolute speed (rpm) of incoming fan

channel-type.label: Fan Out (rpm)
channel-type.description: Current absolute speed (rpm) of outgoing fan

channel-type.label: Sensor T1 Available
channel-type.description: Availability of temperature sensor T1 (outdoor in)

channel-type.label: Sensor T2 Available
channel-type.description: Availability of temperature sensor T2 (indoor in)

channel-type.label: Sensor T3 Available
channel-type.description: Availability of temperature sensor T3 (indoor out)

channel-type.label: Sensor T4 Available
channel-type.description: Availability of temperature sensor T4 (outdoor out)

channel-type.label: Bypass State
channel-type.description: State of the bypass (ON = open / OFF = closed)

channel-type.label: EWT State
channel-type.description: State of the EWT valve (ON = open / OFF = closed)

channel-type.label: EWT Temperature
channel-type.description: Temperature of geothermal heat exchanger sensor

channel-type.label: EWT Temperature (low)
channel-type.description: Lower temperature of the geothermal heat exchanger

channel-type.label: EWT Temperature (high)
channel-type.description: Upper temperature of the geothermal heat exchanger

channel-type.label: EWT Speed Up (%)
channel-type.description: Speed up of the geothermal heat exchanger

channel-type.label: Enthalpy Sensor Timer
channel-type.description: Timer state of the enthalpy sensor

channel-type.label: Comfoair Type
channel-type.description: Type of the ComfoAir (1 = left / 2 = right)

channel-type.label: Comfoair Size
channel-type.description: Size of the ComfoAir (1 = big / 2 = small)

channel-type.label: Cookerhood Delay (P20)
channel-type.description: End delay for cooker hood control (min)

channel-type.label: Filter Period (P24)
channel-type.description: Usage period until filter pollution message (weeks)

channel-type.label: RF Short Delay (P25)
channel-type.description: End delay (RF short actuation) for ventilation level 3 (min)

channel-type.label: RF Long Delay (P26)
channel-type.description: End delay (RF long actuation) for ventilation level 3 (min)
